Vext Terms & Conditions
By using Vext, you agree to these simple rules:
• Be Cool: Don't spam, harass, bully, or share harmful/illegal content.
• You're Accountable: You're responsible for your account and what you post.
• Our Stuff is Ours: The Vext app and its logos are ours. Your messages are yours.
• No Promises: We provide the app "as it is". We can't guarantee it will be perfect 100% of the time.
• We Can Terminate: We can suspend accounts for breaking these rules.

Vext Privacy Policy
We value your privacy. Here's the basics:
1. We Collect:
• What you provide: Your phone number, profile name, and messages.
• To help you connect: Your contacts (if you choose to sync them).
• App analytics: How you use the app to help us fix bugs and improve it.
2. We Protect:
• Your private messages and calls are end-to-end encrypted.
• We can't read or listen to them.
3. We Don't:
• Sell your personal data to third parties.
• Read your private messages.

We've sent a verification link to your email.

1. Open the email from VextApp.
2. Click the link to verify your account.
3. Return to the app to continue.
